DESCRIPTION: Add a role to the list of public roles that users can assign themself with the role command.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}public add [@Role | Role ID | Role Name]** ~ Add all the roles to the database.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}public remove [@Role | Role ID | Role Name]** ~ Removes all the roles from the database.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: Note: The bot must have a role higher than the role you are trying to save in the database.
ALIASES: Public does not have any aliases.
NO_VALID_ROLES: There were no valid roles provided that meet the requirements.
ADDED: {{roles}} was added to the list of public roles.
REMOVED: {{roles}} was removed from the list of public roles.
